column4: How am I supposed to open my .rar files..I already installed rar and the archieve manager still won't open them
use rar-nonfree for rar 3.0 or later
it seems I don't got it enabled
it seems apt-get skips multiverse complitely or something
did u do an apt-get update?
ubuntuguide is unoffical. It's maintained by one person
forgot his nick, he's in here sometimes. some dude from Malaysia. u can ask him to add your repo if u find him
